name: A la rencontre de toutes les manifestations
name_original: A la rencontre de toutes les manifestations
description:
Entry for Gamerella2016 (theme "Inter/Sections") in Poitiers, France.

Musical Game about intersections of protests.

Convince people and bring them to protest in the city center.

First player : up down left right + space or joystick 2+A

Second player : z s q d + left shift or joystick 1+A
